thread.section_title: Exceptional Villas Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Exceptional Villas | www.exceptionalvillas.com
thread.title: Cheryl

author: Cheryl
title: Cheryl
text: ....very timely contacts and suggestions for trip improvement and simplification. Very responsive to queries. Witty and great humor. Noreen was really fun to work with. She showed concern for our safety and the clarity of our arrangements and had never-ending patience for unexpected difficulties with our credit cards and our changing dates. Working with both Noreen and Sean was a total pleasure. I'd recommend them highly and without hesitation. I'm sure we will look them up again.
